nodes.text: Godon Netakka was a Rodian male bounty hunter in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. He tracked down Bandin Dobah, an Aqualish smuggler operating on the planet Formos. Dobah succeeded in convincing him to join his gang. Zukata, his sister, arrived on Formos to find what happened to him. A group of adventurers, on the trail of Dobah, found him on Bandin Dobah's asteroid base.
